Nachname.description: The last name of the author

Vorname.description: The first name of the author

Zeitschrift.description: The journal in which the publication appears

Nr./Heft.description: The issue number of the journal

Seite (von).description: The starting page of the article

Seite (bis).description: The ending page of the article

ISSN(print).description: The print ISSN of the journal

ISSN(elektr.).description: The electronic ISSN of the journal

Begutachtung.description: Indicates whether the publication was peer-reviewed. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Fullpaper/Poster.description: Indicates whether the publication is a full paper or a poster

Internetadresse.description: The internet address or URL of the publication

Freigabe Kurzfassung.description: Indicates whether the abstract is approved for release. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Freigabe Publ..description: Indicates whether the publication is approved for release. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Open-Access-Publ..description: Indicates whether the publication is open access. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Gewicht.description: The weight or significance of the publication, represented as a numeric value

Regel.description: The rule or regulation associated with the publication, represented as a numeric value
